{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated \$2.3M in 2020-2021 on contracts with TECSIS.
{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
- [Tecsis Corporation](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Tecsis%20Corporation%22)
- [TECSIS CORPORATION](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22TECSIS%20CORPORATION%22)
{{< /details >}}
